item.title: Flipping different IoT Industries
item.description:
Healthcare Medical devices connected through a systems network. Retail IoT can help retailers enhance efficiency and reduce Energy Optimizes and facilitates renewable sources. Manufacturing Producers can gain better insights of their operations.
IoMT: Healthcare Solution The Internet of Medical Things (IoMT) has many practical uses in the healthcare world. The most important case being patient monitoring.

item.title: Join the atPlatform developer community
item.description: GitHub Start contributing, This is where the code hits the fan. Discord Learn how it works, Hangout with other developers! Develop and Contribute # You can find out how to contriubte to these docs in our Contribution Guidelines. Hashnode Short technical articles about specific topics! Reddit Join the conversation on our subreddit! Email Support Directly reach our support team for help!
